TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but no matter how much sealing wax used you can not get rid of all those hairs growing out of your sealing.

I wish the next person to post found that funny!

Granted. I laugh hollowly and as though in pain, pretending to echo your amusement in the most painfully mocking way I can muster. You perish amidst my hollow laughter.

I wish sjwt would stop making silly puns.

Granted. Instead of making silly puns, he devours your soul. It is a long and tedious process that would take year to do. You would go insane with that amount of pain

I wish for kittens that won't maul my face off

Granted. The kittens lick you to death.

I wish for snow in Latvia.

Granted, it the begining of a worldwide glaciation.

I wish there was less snow in Canada.

Granted, the earth is much closer to the sun in result. Congratulations in extincting the only life known, smartass.

I wish to STOP TIME!

Granted, it's irreversible

I wish I could make proper snowballs

Granted, but after trowing them, you realize that there was some sharp pieces of glass in them, which killed the totality of the people you aimed at.

I wish I could make a difference.

Granted. You make a difference with the type of cheese on your sandwich.

I wish my crush (who is a girl!) fell in love with me.

granted the girl is a psychopathic serial killer who makes you into a bloody stuffed doll that she hugs everyday

i wish for my intelligence to be exponentially increased

Granted, but everyone else have their intelligence decreased, so that no one understands you

I wish it would snow

Granted. It snows. It starts snowing right this instant. And the snow, no matter how much you wish it would, can never stop. It snows until summer comes, and still it does not stop. It snows until All Hallow's Eve, and still the snow does not relent. The world is quickly buried in snow, but there are no clouds. The snow falls and is melted, sometimes in equal measure, sometimes more liquid or sometimes more solid. Those fortunate enough to escape the perpetual torrents of rain cascading from the sky as the unrelenting snow continually melts are instead buried deep beneath snowdrifts, some of which melt a little and are refrozen by newly fallen snow, encasing them in a vast roofs of ice, never to see the sun again. The world is dying, buried in a cascade of neverending snow and torrential rain.

I wish to be able to throw a baseball at 0.9c.

Granted, now you get bashed for dropping the bomb on Hiroshima.

I wish for a chess playing turk.

Granted, but someone found out you were cheating and executed you

I wish for a grilled cheese.

granted, it's spoiled.

I wish for the below person to get the reference in my signature

Granted, but they think it's stupid and they execute you.

I wish for a longer Christmas break.

Granted, it lasts forever, and you never learn anything again, in fact, no one ever learns anything. Therefore, no one is able to help you when you become patient zero, infected with a new deadly disease, and soon the whole world follows.

I wish more people were into steampunk

Granted, they are so into steam punk that they start a revolution to ban modern technology.

I wish I could play Fallout 3.

Granted, but it's the pre-alpha version.

I wish KSP would lag less.

Granted. They remove the ability to build spaceships.

I wish that the "double posting" rule was removed from this thread

Granted, there are so many posts that the forum games section is removed to save the server.

I wish I get a chess playing chicken friend.

granted ,but hes fried.

I wish for a basic blueberry muffin.

Granted. It is two months old and covered in rat poison

I wish that this wish wasn't edited in half an hour after I posted my reply

Edited January 4, 2014 by Noname117

Granted, Instead it was edited in a quarter of an hour

I wish the alcohol drinking age was lowered to 12.

Granted, the young generation is ruined and unable to take care of their children and run the world.

I wish for a working, non-lethal Phaser Mk 2
